name: claude-code-forge
description: A curated collection of plugins for Claude Code, enhancing your AI-powered development workflow.

plugins.name: pdforge
plugins.description: Product Development Forge - AI-driven 7-phase product development workflow. Provides complete methodology from requirements analysis to deployment, including brainstorming, TDD, three-stage review, and auto-fix loops.

plugins.name: adversarial-debugger
plugins.description: Adversarial Debugging with Agent Teams - Multiple agents investigate competing hypotheses in parallel, challenge each other's findings through structured debate, and converge on the true root cause.

plugins.name: forge-teams
plugins.description: Agent Teams 版产品开发流水线 - 7 阶段对抗协作开发，每个关键决策点使用多 agent 辩论、竞争和交叉验证，含红队攻击和对抗式调试。
